title: Scraping the web
description: Discusses the importance of web scraping for journalists, especially for investigating government data, corporate information, and economic data. Introduces tools for non-coders, such as ScraperWiki and Firefox plugins like Downthemall, iMacros, and OutWitHub. Mentions PDFscraping tools for non-programmers, such as AbbyFine reader and UnPDF. Presents a case study on Europe's Hidden Billions, a project that used web scraping and PDF scraping to analyze EU subsidies, and highlights the results of the investigation.
